title: Starling Cycles Asks Are Steel MTB Frames ACTUALLY Flexy?
content:
Mountain bikers spend a lot of time talking about the “flex” of steel mountain bike frames. They say that they can feel the frame flex on the trail, that steel is more compliant, and that frames twist in corners or feel like spaghetti. But is it actually true? Is a steel frame more flexy than a carbon fiber frame? Joe from Starling Cycles decided it was time to put it to the test and set up his own VERY scientific test at the Starling Workshop, comparing a Starling steel frame to a Nukeproof carbon frame.

You might be surprised by the results! Big ups to Starling Cycles for getting crafty in the shop!
